title: Dyllys
description: Dyllys is an android. Made to look like a human, act like a human, but not have the spirit of a human. However, Dyllys wasn't always this way. Once she had been human. Hundreds of years as a slave unable to feel, Dyllys is coming to the end of her life. Can she learn how to regain her humanity and once again have a human soul before she disappears forever?
author: B.M. Polier
